General.Name: Jtekt India Limited
General.Description: JTEKT India Limited manufactures and sells steering systems and other auto components for the passenger car and utility vehicle manufacturers in the automobile sector in India. The company offers steering gears, machine tools, bearings, columns and RPS assemblies, axle assemblies, and other auto ancillaries. It also exports its precision products to the United States, Europe, and Japan. The company was formerly known as Sona Koyo Steering Systems Limited and changed its name to JTEKT India Limited in April 2018. The company was incorporated in 1984 and is headquartered in Gurugram, India. JTEKT India Limited is a subsidiary of JTEKT Corporation.
